text: Aziz Ahmed (, born 1 January 1961) is a Bangladeshi four Star General. He was also the 16th Chief of Army Staff (CAS) of the Bangladesh Army. ==Career== Ahmed was promoted to the General rank and was appointed as Chief of Army Staff of the Bangladesh Army on 25 June, 2018. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1961 births Category:Bangladeshi generals Category:People from Chittagong Division
title: Aziz Ahmed (general)
